text:
Tired of the complexity and costs of running 
legacy .NET Framework applications on Windows

servers? Want to break free from security 
limitations, rising license costs, and

scaling challenges? Now with AWS Transform, 
transitioning from Windows to Linux has

never been easier. Applications built on the 
legacy .NET Framework restrict you to expensive

Windows server environments, and limit access to 
latest security updates and better performance.

Modernizing these applications to low-cost, 
cross-platform Linux-ready .NET on the cloud

is often costly, labor-intensive, and error-prone, 
especially for large-scale projects. AWS Transform

assists modernization consultants, IT 
teams, and developers with generative

AI to automate and accelerate the process up 
to four times compared to traditional methods.

To get started, use natural language chat to 
provide AWS Transform access to your source

code repository, and then AWS Transform agents 
will analyze your .NET version, project types,

code dependencies, and transform your .NET 
framework code into cross-platform .NET You

can then review and approve the code as you see 
fit. For select applications requiring dedicated

developer attention, the same agent capabilities 
are available in Visual Studio IDE. Accelerate .NET

transformation by up to four times, reduce 
operating costs by up to 40%, and enhance

application performance, security, and governance.
Simplify large-scale transformation of .NET

applications to Linux and free your teams to focus 
on innovation. Get started with AWS Transform today!
